title: Enough RP.BUT CANT BUY SKINS
body: The client doesnt allow me to buy skins at the shop as it says not yet implemented.I restarted the client several times

replies.body: It sounds like you're navigating through the Collections pane which isn't providing unlocks yet.  You'll want to instead go to the **Store **on the top right of the client, next to your balance.  I hope that helps!
That's where the problem lies.It doesn't allow me to buy skins for the champions I own
